		                    Stage II Laryngeal Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage II laryngeal cancer depends on where cancer is found in the larynx.   If cancer is in the supraglottis, treatment may include the following:         -  Radiation therapy     -  Supraglottic laryngectomy or total laryngectomy with or
